item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-01-24
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Boston Burger Company (37 Davis Square, Holland Street, Somerville). #
  • Mmmm PBR #
  • Pabst Blue Ribbon #
  • I'm at Kickass Cupcakes (378 Highland Avenue, at Cutter, Somerville). #
  • I'm at Staples (Fresh Pond) (186 Alewife Brook Pkwy, Cambridge). #
  • Watching Caprica, so far it's kind of meh. #
  • I'm at Ghazal (711 Centre Street, Jamaica Plain). #
  • I'm at City Feed and Supply (672 Centre Street, at Seaverns Avenue, Jamaica Plain). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
